Reports duplicate property keys with different values, duplicate keys, or duplicate property values. Example: 'property1=value;
property2=value;' The Options list allows selecting the area in which the inspection should search for duplicates.
Reports properties that are not referenced outside of the .properties file they are contained in.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports properties that are not referenced outside of the .properties file they are contained in.

shortDescription.text: TestNG Javadoc can be converted to annotations

fullDescription.text:
Asserts your TestNG tests with Javadoc annotations and converts them to JDK annotations. Example: '/**
    * @testng.before-test
  */
  public void sample() {}' After the quick-fix is applied: '@BeforeTest
  public void sample() {}'

Reports undefined group names passed to the 'dependsOnGroups' or 'groups' attributes in the '@Test' annotation. The quick-fix adds an undefined name to a list of known groups. Use the Defined Groups field to define a comma-separated list of known groups.
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports undefined group names passed to the `dependsOnGroups` or `groups` attributes in the `@Test` annotation.

The quick-fix adds an undefined name to a list of known groups.

Use the **Defined Groups** field to define a comma-separated list of known groups.

shortDescription.text: JUnit Test can be converted to TestNG
Expected exception never thrown in test method body

fullDescription.text: Reports test classes that are not registered in 'testing.xml'. This is often a mistake because such tests won't be executed.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports test classes that are not registered in `testing.xml`. This is often a mistake because such tests won't be executed.

fullDescription.text: Reports event handler issues, including incompatible argument types, ambiguous event handler methods, and incorrect return types.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports event handler issues, including incompatible argument types, ambiguous event handler methods, and incorrect return types.

fullDescription.text: Reports properties in .fxml files (both attributes and tags) that have the default values and therefore are redundant.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports properties in .fxml files (both attributes and tags) that have the default values and therefore are redundant.

fullDescription.text: Reports unresolved fx:id references. The quick-fix creates the corresponding fields.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports unresolved fx:id references. The quick-fix creates the corresponding fields.

fullDescription.text: Reports unused imports in .fxml files.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports unused imports in .fxml files.

fullDescription.text: Reports redundant tags in .fxml files. These tags correspond to a class property which is declared in the @DefaultProperty class annotation, that is why they can be omitted.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports redundant tags in .fxml files. These tags correspond to a class property which is declared in the @DefaultProperty class annotation, that is why they can be omitted.

shortDescription.text: Color component is out of range

fullDescription.text: Reports RGB color components that are out of the valid range.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports RGB color components that are out of the valid range.

shortDescription.text: The value from properties file is incompatible with the attribute type

fullDescription.text: Reports attribute values defined in a .properties file that do not match the type of the attribute.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports attribute values defined in a .properties file that do not match the type of the attribute.

fullDescription.text: Reports unneeded modifiers for classes annotated with '@UtilityClass'.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports unneeded modifiers for classes annotated with `@UtilityClass`.

fullDescription.text: Reports Spring '@Qualifier' annotations on class fields that are ignored by the corresponding Lombok '@RequiredArgsConstructor' and '@AllArgsConstructor' annotations. The generated constructors will not receive the '@Qualifier' annotation without a 'lombok.copyableAnnotations' definition inside the 'lombok.config' file.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports Spring `@Qualifier` annotations on class fields that are ignored by the corresponding Lombok `@RequiredArgsConstructor` and `@AllArgsConstructor` annotations. The generated constructors will not receive the `@Qualifier` annotation without a `lombok.copyableAnnotations` definition inside the `lombok.config` file.

fullDescription.text: Reports unneeded 'final' modifiers before 'val'.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports unneeded `final` modifiers before `val`.

fullDescription.text: Reports explicitly defined Slf4j Loggers. The '@Slf4j' annotation can be used instead.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports explicitly defined *Slf4j* Loggers. The `@Slf4j` annotation can be used instead.

fullDescription.text: Reports unneeded modifiers for classes annotated with '@Value'.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports unneeded modifiers for classes annotated with `@Value`.

fullDescription.text: Offers general inspections for Lombok annotations.
fullDescription.markdown: Offers general inspections for Lombok annotations.

fullDescription.text: Reports deprecated Lombok annotations and suggests quick-fixes to replace them with the ones promoted to the main package.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports deprecated Lombok annotations and suggests quick-fixes to replace them with the ones promoted to the main package.

shortDescription.text: Invalid property key in a UI form

fullDescription.text: Reports unresolved references to .properties files.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports unresolved references to .properties files.

fullDescription.text: Reports focusable components with the 'text' property or labels with the assigned 'labelFor' property that do not have a mnemonic character. The quick-fix assigns a unique mnemonic to such a component.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports focusable components with the `text` property or labels with the assigned `labelFor` property that do not have a mnemonic character. The quick-fix assigns a unique mnemonic to such a component.

fullDescription.text: Reports 'Scrollable' components, except for 'JTextField', that are not placed in 'JScrollPane'. The quick-fix surrounds the problematic component with a scroll pane.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports `Scrollable` components, except for `JTextField`, that are not placed in `JScrollPane`. The quick-fix surrounds the problematic component with a scroll pane.

fullDescription.text: Reports typos and misspelling in your UI forms (for example, in a 'JLabel' text or 'JPanel' title) and fixes them with one click.
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports typos and misspelling in your UI forms (for example, in a `JLabel` text or `JPanel` title) and fixes them
with one click.

shortDescription.text: Hardcoded string literal in a UI form

fullDescription.text: Reports any instances of hardcoded strings in your UI forms. Hardcoded string literals are usually errors in an internationalized environment. This inspection does not report empty strings and strings consisting of only whitespace. The quick-fix transforms a string literal into a reference to a property in a resource bundle.
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports any instances of hardcoded strings in your UI forms.

Hardcoded string literals are usually errors in
an internationalized environment.
This inspection does not report empty strings and strings consisting of only whitespace.

The quick-fix transforms a string literal
into a reference to a property in a resource bundle.

fullDescription.text: Reports assignments to fields which are bound to components in UI Designer forms. Such assignments will cause the component setup code generated by UI Designer for such fields to be ignored.
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports assignments to fields which are bound to components in UI Designer forms.

Such assignments will cause the component setup code generated by UI Designer
for such fields to be ignored.

fullDescription.text: Reports components that do not have any static text and do not have any label marked with 'setLabelFor' for this component. Components that do not have static text include edit fields and combo boxes. Such components cannot be activated with a keyboard shortcut. The quick-fix for this inspection allows you to automatically associate an adjacent label with the problematic component.
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports components that do not have any static text and do not have any label marked with `setLabelFor` for this component.

Components that do not have static text include edit fields and combo boxes.
Such components cannot be activated with a keyboard shortcut. The quick-fix for this inspection
allows you to automatically associate an adjacent label with the problematic component.

fullDescription.text: Reports 'ButtonGroup' instances that contain only one 'JRadioButton'.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports `ButtonGroup` instances that contain only one `JRadioButton`.

fullDescription.text: Reports components that have duplicated mnemonic characters. The quick-fix assigns a unique mnemonic character to each of the components.
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports components that have duplicated mnemonic characters.

The quick-fix assigns a unique mnemonic character to each of the components.

shortDescription.text: Radio button not in a group

fullDescription.text: Reports 'JRadioButton' components that are not placed in 'ButtonGroup'. A quick-fix is available to group radio buttons placed in adjacent grid cells.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports `JRadioButton` components that are not placed in `ButtonGroup`. A quick-fix is available to group radio buttons placed in adjacent grid cells.

fullDescription.text: Allows viewing the problems reported by the Java annotator: compilation problems, unresolved by IDEA references, and so on.
fullDescription.markdown: Allows viewing the problems reported by the Java annotator: compilation problems, unresolved by IDEA references, and so on.

shortDescription.text: Check Kotlin and Java source code coverage

fullDescription.text: Reports methods and classes whose coverage is below a certain threshold.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports methods and classes whose coverage is below a certain threshold.

fullDescription.text: Reports issues essential to this file like syntax errors, unresolved methods and variables, etc...
fullDescription.markdown: Reports issues essential to this file like syntax errors, unresolved methods and variables, etc...

fullDescription.text: Allows viewing the problems reported by the Kotlin annotator: compilation problems, references unresolved by the IDE, and so on.
fullDescription.markdown: Allows viewing the problems reported by the Kotlin annotator: compilation problems, references unresolved by the IDE, and so on.

fullDescription.text: To ensure consistency between different tools, file links should not contain spaces. Example: '[Some file link](some file.md)' A quick-fix replaces spaces with their url-encoded equivalent: '[Some file link](some%20file.md)'
fullDescription.markdown:
To ensure consistency between different tools, file links should not contain spaces.

**Example:**


      [Some file link](some file.md)

A quick-fix replaces spaces with their url-encoded equivalent:


      [Some file link](some%20file.md)

fullDescription.text: Checks if a particular table of contents section corresponds to the actual structure of the document.
fullDescription.markdown: Checks if a particular table of contents section corresponds to the actual structure of the document.

fullDescription.text: Reports unresolved link labels in Markdown files.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports unresolved link labels in Markdown files.

fullDescription.text: Checks if table is correctly formatted.
fullDescription.markdown: Checks if table is correctly formatted.

fullDescription.text: Checks if table has correct side borders. For compatibility reasons all table rows should have borders (pipe symbols) at the start and at the end.
fullDescription.markdown: Checks if table has correct side borders. For compatibility reasons all table rows should have borders (pipe symbols) at the start and at the end.

fullDescription.text: Ordered list items are expected to have straight numeration starting from 1. The motivation behind this is that most of Markdown processors are ignoring the numbering of ordered lists. A processor will generate an '<ol>' element for such list, that will number items continuously from 1.
fullDescription.markdown:
Ordered list items are expected to have straight numeration starting from 1.

The motivation behind this is that most of Markdown processors are ignoring the numbering of ordered lists. A processor will generate an `<ol>` element for such list, that will number items continuously from 1.

fullDescription.text: Reports unresolved file references in Markdown files.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports unresolved file references in Markdown files.

fullDescription.text: Reports unresolved header references in Markdown files.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports unresolved header references in Markdown files.

fullDescription.text: Reports an obsolete HTML5 tag. Suggests replacing the obsolete tag with a CSS or another tag.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports an obsolete HTML5 tag. Suggests replacing the obsolete tag with a CSS or another tag.

fullDescription.text: Reports a missing 'summary' attribute in a 'table' tag. Suggests adding a'summary' attribute. Based on WCAG 2.0: H73.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports a missing `summary` attribute in a `table` tag. Suggests adding a`summary` attribute. Based on WCAG 2.0: [H73](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H73.html).

fullDescription.text: Reports an unresolved web link. Works by making network requests in the background.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports an unresolved web link. Works by making network requests in the background.

fullDescription.text: Reports a form element ('input', 'textarea', or 'select') without an associated label. Suggests creating a new label. Based on WCAG 2.0: H44.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports a form element (`input`, `textarea`, or `select`) without an associated label. Suggests creating a new label. Based on WCAG 2.0: [H44](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H44.html).

fullDescription.text: Reports a missing title attribute 'frame', 'iframe', 'dl', and 'a' tags. Suggests adding a title attribute. Based on WCAG 2.0: H33, H40, and H64.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports a missing title attribute `frame`, `iframe`, `dl`, and `a` tags. Suggests adding a title attribute. Based on WCAG 2.0: [H33](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H33.html), [H40](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H40.html), and [H64](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H64.html).

fullDescription.text: Reports a missing 'title' element inside a 'head' section. Suggests adding a 'title' element. The title should describe the document. Based on WCAG 2.0: H25.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports a missing `title` element inside a `head` section. Suggests adding a `title` element. The title should describe the document. Based on WCAG 2.0: [H25](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H25.html).

fullDescription.text: Reports an obsolete HTML5 attribute.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports an obsolete HTML5 attribute.

fullDescription.text: Reports a missing 'alt' attribute in a 'img' or 'applet' tag or in a 'area' element of an image map. Suggests adding a required attribute with a text alternative for the contents of the tag. Based on WCAG 2.0: H24, H35, H36, H37.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports a missing `alt` attribute in a `img` or `applet` tag or in a `area` element of an image map. Suggests adding a required attribute with a text alternative for the contents of the tag. Based on WCAG 2.0: [H24](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H24.html), [H35](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H35.html), [H36](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H36.html), [H37](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H37.html).

fullDescription.text: Reports a 'width' and 'height' attribute value of a 'img' tag that is different from the actual width and height of the referenced image.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports a `width` and `height` attribute value of a `img` tag that is different from the actual width and height of the referenced image.

fullDescription.text: Reports a missing 'lang' (or 'xml:lang') attribute in a 'html' tag. Suggests adding a required attribute to state the default language of the document. Based on WCAG 2.0: H57.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports a missing `lang` (or `xml:lang`) attribute in a `html` tag. Suggests adding a required attribute to state the default language of the document. Based on WCAG 2.0: [H57](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H57.html).

fullDescription.text: Reports a presentational HTML tag. Suggests replacing the presentational tag with a CSS or another tag.
fullDescription.markdown: Reports a presentational HTML tag. Suggests replacing the presentational tag with a CSS or another tag.

fullDescription.text: Reports usages of Vulnerable APIs of imported dependencies. Fixing the reported problems helps prevent your software from being compromised by an attacker. To solve a problem, you can update to a version where the vulnerability is fixed (if available) or switch to a dependency that doesn't have the vulnerability. Vulnerability data provided by Checkmarx (c).
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports usages of Vulnerable APIs of imported dependencies.

Fixing the reported problems helps prevent your software from being compromised by an attacker.

To solve a problem, you can update to a version where the vulnerability is fixed (if available) or switch to a dependency that doesn't have the vulnerability.

Vulnerability data provided by [Checkmarx](https://checkmarx.com/) (c).

fullDescription.text: Reports vulnerabilities in Gradle, Maven, NPM and PyPI dependencies declared in your project. A full list of Gradle and Maven dependencies is shown in the Project tool window under External Libraries. Fixing the reported problems helps prevent your software from being compromised by an attacker. To solve a problem, you can update to a version where the vulnerability is fixed (if available) or switch to a dependency that doesn't have the vulnerability. The quick-fixes available may suggest updating to a safe version or visiting the Checkmarx website to learn more about a particular vulnerability. Vulnerability data provided by Checkmarx (c).
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports vulnerabilities in Gradle, Maven, NPM and PyPI dependencies declared in your project.
A full list of Gradle and Maven dependencies is shown in the Project tool window under External Libraries.

The quick-fixes available may suggest updating to a safe version or visiting the Checkmarx website to learn more about a particular vulnerability.

The quick-fixes available may suggest updating to a safe version or visiting the Checkmarx website to learn more about a particular vulnerability. Vulnerability data provided by Checkmarx (c).

fullDescription.text:
Reports a mismatch between a scalar value type in YAML file and types of the values in the similar positions. Example: 'myElements:
  - value1
  - value2
  - false # <- reported, because it is a boolean value, while other values are strings'
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports a mismatch between a scalar value type in YAML file and types of the values in the similar positions.

**Example:**


    myElements:
      - value1
      - value2
      - false # <- reported, because it is a boolean value, while other values are strings

fullDescription.text:
Reports duplicated keys in YAML files. Example: 'same_key: some value
  same_key: another value'
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports duplicated keys in YAML files.

**Example:**


      same_key: some value
      same_key: another value

fullDescription.text: Reports unresolved aliases in YAML files. Example: 'some_key: *unknown_alias'
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports unresolved aliases in YAML files.

**Example:**


      some_key: *unknown_alias

fullDescription.text:
Reports recursion in YAML aliases. Alias can't be recursive and be used inside the data referenced by a corresponding anchor. Example: 'some_key: &some_anchor
    sub_key1: value1
    sub_key2: *some_anchor'
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports recursion in YAML aliases.

Alias can't be recursive and be used inside the data referenced by a corresponding anchor.

**Example:**


      some_key: &some_anchor
        sub_key1: value1
        sub_key2: *some_anchor

fullDescription.text:
Reports unused anchors. Example: 'some_key: &some_anchor
    key1: value1'
fullDescription.markdown:
Reports unused anchors.

**Example:**


      some_key: &some_anchor
        key1: value1
